articles.author: Adam Sweeting
articles.title: Irene Cara obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: American actor and singer best known for her role in the film Fame and co-writing the 1983 hit Flashdance … What a Feeling
articles.content: Although her catalogue of recordings was not large, there were two songs that guaranteed Irene Cara a permanent place in the pop music hall of fame. In 1980 Cara, who has died unexpectedly aged 63, a… [+5566 chars]
